content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to execute a shell and open a website about time on Firefox. No other developments to report.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'Error: no DISPLAY environment variable specified\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/time/", "question": "What is time and how does it work?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text explores various philosophical theories and debates surrounding the nature of time. It discusses the A-theory and B-theory of time, with the former positing that time passes and has a direction, while the latter sees time as a static four-dimensional block. The text also covers different views on the topology of time, including presentism and eternalism. Additionally, the text explores the relationship between time and physics, including the theory of relativity and quantum mechanics. Overall, the text provides a comprehensive overview of the complex and multifaceted concept of time, but does not provide a definitive answer to the question of what time is and how it works. \n \n Links: [\' (https://plato.stanford.edu/index.html)\', \'Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (https://plato.stanford.edu/index.html)\', \' Browse (https://plato.stanford.edu/entries/time/)\', \'Table of Contents (https://plato.stanford.edu/contents.html)\', "What\'s New (https://plato.stanford.edu/new.html)"]'}]
"""
